name: Newneek Co., Ltd.
description: Operator of a digital media platform intended to publish news articles online. The company's platform offers e-mail newsletters that convey current issues that are provided on a subscription basis directly to the reader with a focus on authenticity and humor, enabling subscribers to get access to daily news in the mail.
one_liner: Operator of a digital media platform intended to publish news articles online. The company's platform offers e-mail newsletters that convey current issues that are provided on a subscription basis directly to the reader with a focus on authenticity and humor, enabling subscribers to get access to daily news in the mail.
